name: FormatCheck
description: Checks if code formatting is correct using dotnet format. Any issues found are posted as a comment to the PR.
author: A. Jeckmans

inputs.name: SolutionPath
inputs.label: Solution Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the solution directory.

inputs.name: IncludePath
inputs.label: Include Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to be included.

inputs.name: ExcludePath
inputs.label: Exclude Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to be excluded.

inputs.name: FailOnFormattingErrors
inputs.label: Fail on Formatting Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to false, the task will NOT fail when formatting errors are found.

inputs.name: StatusCheck
inputs.label: Set PR Status Check
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to true, the task will set a status check in the PR when formatting errors are found.

inputs.name: StatusCheckName
inputs.label: Status Check Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the status check in the PR for formatting errors. This input is only considered if 'Set PR Status Check' is true.

inputs.name: StatusCheckGenre
inputs.label: Status Check Genre
inputs.helpMarkDown: Genre of the status check in the PR for formatting errors. This input is only considered if 'Set PR Status Check' is true.

inputs.name: ScopeToPullRequest
inputs.label: Scope to Pull Request
inputs.helpMarkDown: When checked, the task only considers failures for files in the pull request. E.g., only add comments to files on the PR and fail only for failures for comments in the PR.
